verses.name: Leviticus 8:32
verses.text: And that which remaineth of the flesh and of the bread shall ye burn with fire.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:33
verses.text: And ye shall not go out of the door of the tabernacle of the congregation in seven days, until the days of your consecration be at an end: for seven days shall he consecrate you.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:34
verses.text: As he hath done this day, so the Lord hath commanded to do, to make an atonement for you.
